verses.verse: <S%G1063>For<s%> there is no <S%G3762>man<s%> that <S%G4160>does<s%> any <S%G5100>thing<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2927>secret<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2212>he<s%> <S%G846>himself<s%> <S%G2212>seeks<s%> to be <S%G1511%G99999>known<s%> <S%G3954>openly<s%>. <S%G1487>If<s%> you <S%G4160>do<s%> these <S%G5023>things<s%>, <S%G5319>show<s%> <S%G4572>yourself<s%> to the <S%G2889>world<s%>.
